VARTIKA SARAN 
 2x Salesforce Certified 

­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ 
  Senior Salesforce developer backboned in Java with 5 years exp. in architecturing                       

optimally scalable solutions for complex problems. Lightning proficient, SFDX                 
Evangelist, skilled in gathering and simplifying business requirements. Worked on                   
automation estimating tool reducing manual efforts by 90%. 
­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ 

  +91 9079357910      vartika.saran28@gmail.com   
https://www.linkedin.com/in/vartika‑saran 

 

APEX  |  LIGHTNING  |  SFDX |  VISUALFORCE  |  APEX DATA LOADER  |  CONGA COMPOSER  |  DELL BOOMI 
EINSTEIN  |  JAVA  |  JAVASCRIPT  |  JQUERY  |  HTML  |  CSS  |  SOQL  |  SQL  |  ANGULAR  JS  |  GIT  |  ANT  
 
 

    JOB EXPERIENCES 
  ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ 

     
 
 SENIOR SALESFORCE 

DEVELOPER 
June 2018 – Present 

 
 

SALESFORCE 
DEVELOPER 

June 2017 – June 2018 
 
 

 

  APPIRIO, A Wipro Company, Jaipur, India 
 

● Designed, developed and deployed Apex Classes, Controller Classes &                 
Extensions, Test classes, Batches, Asynchronous Apex, error handling and Apex                   
Triggers using bulk design patterns for various functional needs in the                     
application and Salesforce customizations. 

● Experience in handling Salesforce Configurations like Permission setting using                 
OWD, Profiles, Permission sets, sharing rules, Validation Rules, Workflows,                 
process builder, approval processes etc. 

● Worked with Dynamic Apex to access sObjects and Field describe information,                     
execute dynamic SOQL, SOSL and DML queries. 

● Experience in lightning web components development. Actively worked on                 
Lightning migration of internal Org and creation of custom LEX components. 

● Responsible for Dell Boomi process creation and maintenance (Appirio                 
‑Wipro(Trace) Integration / Workday ‑ SFDC Integration) 

 
Key Achievements  
● Being an internal IT team member donned on multiple hats for end to end                           

project delivery starting from requirement gathering, analysis to design                 
walkthroughs, development, testing and deployment into production org.               
serving multiple departments across Appirio like Finance, Marketing, HR,                 
consulting Ops, transport etc. 

● As a ADX(SFDX) evangelist, did a modularized version control POC for an                       
internal module and presented it to entire technology team. 

      ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ 
   
 

ASSOCIATE 
 DEVELOPER 

Dec 2016 – May 2017 
 
 

PROGRAMMER 
ANALYST 

May 2015 – Dec 2016 
 
 

PROGRAMMER 
ANALYST 
TRAINEE 

May 2014 – May 2015 
 

  COGNIZANT Tech. Solutions, Pune, India 
 

● Developed software solutions for a leading U.S. bank as a client in Banking &                           
Financial Services (BFS) domain. 

● Design and development of project as per client requirements to create a fault                         
tolerant code with efficiency standards on Java platform. 

● Wrote unit test cases for the specific unit; seek reviews from peers, resolving                         
Sonarqube/Veracode security fixes related to the project. 

● Worked on Java/J2EE technologies, Spring framework, Restful web services,                 
Angular JS (basics), hibernate, Jsp, Servlets , SQL, DB2, mockito Junit framework. 

 
Key Achievements  
● Enhanced trust customer capabilities through SSO to client portal for finance                     

management through the online banking app. Allowed offers to flow based on                       
customer ‘s eligibility and business rules. 

● Assisted in Migration of code from JSP servlet architecture to Spring                     
microservice framework for enabling the service layer for mobile banking and                     
online banking apps.

   PROJECTS    ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ 

  APPIRIO 
GAMIFICATION ENGINE 

‑ SFDX & LEX 
MIGRATION 

 
 
 

 

  Gamification engine used for tracking a person’s “Appirio story” i.e profile 
information, for rewards and recognition purpose.  
● Migrated the application on CI/CD (GitLab CI) tools using SFDX & ADX for                         

version control (GitLab) including extraction of manifests and retrieving their                   
dependencies to create a stand alone package for automated Salesforce                   
deployments. 

● Created custom LEX components for essential modules like badges & Challenges                     
etc. 

      ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ 
  APPIRIO’S 

NEXT‑GENERATION 
ESTIMATOR TOOL (E2) 

 

  Tool used by sales team, to produce proposals faster by calculating all estimates of                           
deal at one place. 
● Developed & delivered critical features for the tool. Worked extensively on                     

Slickgrid, Java Script, Jquery, conga composer and Apex along with                   
responsibilities for testing, deployments and maintenance. 

● Configured Conga templates for automated SOW generation for workday and                   
salesforce practices, reducing manual efforts by 90%. 

      ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ 
  FLEXI TIME REQUEST 

PORTAL(FTR) 
 

  A feature added in salesforce org to facilitate employees working in Shifts to avail                           
company transportation, meals by raising the requests from this portal. It notifies the                         
Transportation & facility teams to make the necessary arrangements. 
● Provided solutions by developing approval process, workflow, email               

notifications and Triggers to implement the functionality. 
       

   EDUCATION    ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ 

  BACHELORS OF 
TECHNOLOGY 
2009 – 2013 

  Jodhpur Institute of Engineering & Technology, Rajasthan Technical 
University 

     

   AWARDS    ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ 

  PAT ON THE BACK    Award  for  key deliverables on Boomi Integrations and E2 Enhancements. 

  SHOUTOUTS    Received Gamification points from my managers, leads & product customers for quality 
and on time delivery 

     

   CERTIFICATIONS    ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ 

  SALESFORCE 
PLATFORM 

DEVELOPER I 

  Based on skills and experience to build custom declarative and programmatic 
applications on the Salesforce platform. 

  SALESFORCE 
ADMINISTRATOR 

  Possess broad knowledge of customizing Salesforce, regularly configuring the platform, 
managing users, and looking for ways to get even more out of its features and 
capabilities. 

  JAVA    Certified in Core Java, J2EE technologies & Advanced Java from Cognizant Academy, 
Chennai
